wikipedia_page.main: Ronnie Williams ((1907-01-23)23 January 1907 – 1987) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 2 matches. He played his first match on 29 September 1934 against England and his last match on 21 November 1934 against Scotland. On club level he played for Swansea Town, Chester and Newcastle United.
